data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chan, Tin-Yam, Cleva, Régis, Chu, Ka Hou (2016): On the genus Trachysalambria Burkenroad, 1934 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Penaeidae), with descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 4150 (3): 201-254, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4150.3.1|152 occurrences
